about_the_game:
You've played the game, you know the vigilante, now own the music!

Music From and Inspired by Street Cleaner: The Video Game isn't just the complete soundtrack of chip tunes used in the game, it's also three full synth arranged versions and the extended cut of the trailer introduction song!

Tracks 1, 3, and 4 are Street Cleaner arranged versions of in-game tracks.

Track 2 is the full version of the Street Cleaner song used in Trailer #2.

Tracks 5 - 18 appear in “Street Cleaner: The Video Game” by Creaky Lantern Games
